Description: Gabled sandstone stela of Abraham the Monk; panel of Coptic text above a dove and a cross within a wreath; attachment-hole.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.133, Pl.93)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: Sir Ernest A T Wallis Budge
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 93:3 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
